metadata.description: The Marvel Universe is about to get even more astonishing with a gritty with a no-holds-barred Wolverine/Punisher tale you have to see to believe! Plus, an Iron Man tale AND a story of Cannonball and Sunspot of the New Mutants getting sucked into the wildest adventure of their short lives when they spend their summer vacation in...MOJOWORLD!!
metadata.name: Astonishing Tales
